title: Jean-Luc Mélenchon – POLITICO
snippet: ... Responses to the 96-year-old’s death have become something of a political Rorschach test in France. ... The Socialists have taken timid steps toward emancipation from far-left firebrand Jean-Luc Mélenchon.

title: Jean-Luc Mélenchon - Wikipedia
snippet: Mélenchon has been labelled a populist by numerous diverse people, with the Socialist Party senator Luc Carvounas saying he goes to "the summits of demagoguery and populism", and the magazine Slate stating that Mélenchon's rhetoric is "shocking" and implying his entire political life is based around pleasing the people.

title: Jean-Luc Mélenchon - World news, culture and opinion
snippet: The Parti Socialiste, which has broken free of radical-left leader Jean-Luc Mélenchon, is not done with its battles. It will, by 2027, need to win back moderate voters who have shunned it for the past seven years, at a time when PM François ...

title: Jean-Luc Mélenchon | The Guardian
snippet: All parties except National Rally and La France Insoumise called on by president to show ‘collective responsibility’

title: The French left is finally eyeing a comeback – POLITICO
snippet: Mélenchon is “best placed” to beat other left-wing candidates, but he’s “not the best placed to win the presidential election, even against the far right.” · Talks between the left and Bayrou never really took off. | Richard Bouhet/AFP via Getty Images · Socialist Party officials believe the political winds may be shifting in their favor.
